name: Woocommerce Customer Order Status
author: Purvik

sections.description:
Install plugin to previous order of customer from your admin order page

Easy to use, you only install the plugin.

We test our plugins with many other. If you find incompatibility with one specific plugin, please contact me on purvik.me.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wc-customer-order-status.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload wc-customer-order-status.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Code is required to use this plugin?

No code require to use this plugin.

Is required WooCommerce to use this plugin?

Yes WooCommerce is required to use this plugin.
